color_general_main_text.label: Main text
color_general_main_text.info: Used for the whole website as main text color.

color_general_heading.label: Heading
color_general_heading.info: Color for H1 and H2 hedings.

color_general_catalog_text.label: Catalog text
color_general_catalog_text.info: Used as title color for product on cart page.

color_product_preview_price.label: Preview price
color_product_preview_price.info: Color used for products price in preview mode.

color_product_note.label: Tax note
color_product_note.info: Used as a color for tax notes on cart page.

color_label_bg.label: Background
color_label_bg.info: Used for all the labels such as "sale", "new" etc.

color_label_sale_bg.label: Background
color_label_sale_bg.info: Special color used for labels marked as "sale"

color_label_sold_bg.label: Background
color_label_sold_bg.info: Special color used for labels marked as "sold out / out of stock"

color_icons_social.label: Social
color_icons_social.info: Color used for social icons in shair block.

color_events_link_hover.label: Link hover
color_events_link_hover.info: Color used for an active and hovering links, tabs, icons etc.

color_events_link_hover_secondary.label: Link secondary hover
color_events_link_hover_secondary.info: Color used for an active and hovering links, tabs, icons etc.

color_events_border_hover.label: Border hover
color_events_border_hover.info: Colors used for an active and hovering buttons.

type_header_font.label: Skrifttype
type_header_font.info: Dersom du velger en annen skrifttype kan det påvirke hastigheten i butikken. [Finn ut mer om systemskrifter.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_body_font.label: Skrifttype
type_body_font.info: Dersom du velger en annen skrifttype kan det påvirke hastigheten i butikken. [Finn ut mer om systemskrifter.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_header_font_external.label: External font
type_header_font_external.info: Selecting this font would disable internal font for headings.

type_body_font_external.label: External font
type_body_font_external.info: Selecting this font would disable internal font for body.

settings.paragraph: Handlekurv- og kassepriser viser alltid valutakoder. Eksempel: 1,00 USD.

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

badge_names.info: Add here your own badges with the same name as product tag, separated by comma.

show_gallery.label: Show product galleries

enable_video_looping.label: Enable video looping

show_money_with_currency.label: Show money with currency at "Checkout" button

collection.label: Empty drawer promoted collection
collection.info: Visible when cart drawer is empty.

show_view_all.label: Aktiver «Vis alle»-knapp hvis listen inneholder flere samlinger enn de som vises

show_view_all.label: Aktiver «Vis alle»-knapp hvis bloggen inneholder flere blogginnlegg enn de som vises

heading.label: Overskrift
heading.info: Overskrift kreves for å vise menyen.

menu.label: Meny
menu.info: Vises bare på menyelementer i toppnivå.

header__1.info: Abonnenter legges automatisk til i «aksepterer markedsføring»-kundelisten. [Finn ut mer](https://help.shopify.com/manual/customers/manage-customers)

header__2.info: Koble til kontoer i sosiale medier i temainnstillingene for å vise dem.

header__4.info: Gå til [betalingsinnstillingene](/admin/settings/payments) for å legge til et land/region.

header__6.info: Gå til [språkinnstillingene](/admin/settings/languages) for å legge til et språk.

header__9.info: To allow customers to follow your store on the Shop app from your storefront, Shop Pay must be enabled. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)

logo.label: Logobilde
logo.info: This image would be disabled if used svg logo

enable_sticky_header.info: Overskriften vises på skjermen når kunden blar opp.

logo_svg.label: Logo SVG
logo_svg.info: Add inline code of svg image [Learn more - link on our documentation](https://Our-Link-To-Documentation)

hide_header_icons.label: Hide header icons
hide_header_icons.info: Icons for the header elements such as search, login, cart.

mega_menu_image.label: Default mega menu image
mega_menu_image.info: An image is displayed in the mega menu and mobile menu as the default image, and it will be replaced by the product, collection, blog post image upon hover.

hide_mega_menu_image_mobile.label: Hide mega menu image component for mobile

header__4.info: To add a country/region, go to your [market settings.](/admin/settings/markets)

enable_mobile_social.label: Show social icons on mobile menu
